works.description:
Ranjith is a director who has learned from  
his experience a lot.We just cannot compare the old movies of Ranjith, to  
the present style of Ranjith Movies, starting from Devasuram.Based on  
R.Unni’s short story Leela,hitmaker Ranjith’s next movie is named as  
Leela.Director Shyamaprasad will be composing music for the movie Leela .  
ScriptWriter Shankar Ramakrishnan is doing an important role in the movie  
too. Ann Augstine is confirmed to be in the title role of the film Leela,  
the never ending play.Another speciality of the movie is Veteran actors  
Thilakan & Nedumudi Venu is sharing screen after a long time.
Leela’s locations will be at  Thiruvananthapuram , Ernakulam , Kuttanad and  
Wayanad.As per the sources Kunjunni,son of reknowned cinemetographer  
S.Kumar will be doing a role in this movie.Movie will be released under  
Renjith’s Capitol Theatre.Ranjith’s last film Indian Rupee was a hit but,  
it could have been better by giving enough publicity through various  
sources.The publicity was limited to one or two online media and some  
magazines.The movie ran for a long time at the screens though it took time  
to pick up initially.Hopefully the same will not be repeated for this  
movie. This movie will definitely give the talented Ann Augustine and a  
director like Ranjith would definitely explore the skills of this young  
actress, who has inherited the talent from her dad, actor Augustine.
